TABLE.NAME: ulcc_form_library
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for ulcc_form_library, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: ulcc_form_lib_plugin
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains all plugins that have created a form in the form library

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the plugin that has invoked the form library

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: the type of moodle plugin that this is

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time at which the record was last modified

TABLE.NAME: ulcc_form_lib_form_element
TABLE.COMMENT: contains all form elements installed in the form library

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name of the form element class

FIELD.NAME: tablename
FIELD.COMMENT: the name of the table that will hold data for this plugin

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: the status of the plugin, is it available to be added to a form, 0 = disabled 1 = enabled

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time that the record was last modified

TABLE.NAME: ulcc_form_lib_form
TABLE.COMMENT: contains all forms created in the form library

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: the name of the form, that will displayed when displaying the form

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: information that will be displayed at the time the form is displayed

FIELD.NAME: plugin_id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the plugin that created this form (from the ulcc_form_lib_plugin table)

FIELD.NAME: creator_id
FIELD.COMMENT: the user table id of the user who created the form

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: the status of the form 0 = disabled 1 = enabled

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: freetext field allowing a developer to specify a type for a form this can be then used in a plugin invoking the form library to differenciate forms

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time that the record was last modified

TABLE.NAME: ulcc_form_lib_form_field
TABLE.COMMENT: holds data on all form fields

FIELD.NAME: label
FIELD.COMMENT: the label that will be displayed next to the form field

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: information on the form element to be displayed with the form element

FIELD.NAME: formelement_id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the form element that this field is

FIELD.NAME: position
FIELD.COMMENT: the postion of the field in the form

FIELD.NAME: required
FIELD.COMMENT: is this field required

FIELD.NAME: form_id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the form that this field is in

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time that the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of last time the record was modified

TABLE.NAME: ulcc_form_lib_submission
TABLE.COMMENT: contains meta data on a form submission

FIELD.NAME: form_id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the form that the submission was created for

FIELD.NAME: creator_id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the user who created the submission

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time at which the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time at which this record was last modified
